      • repaintBitmap

        public void repaintBitmap(FramebufferUpdateRectangle rect)
        Saves protocol and simply invokes native JPanel repaint method which asyncroniously register repaint request using invokeLater to repaint be runned in Swing event dispatcher thread. So may be called from other threads.
        Specified by:
        repaintBitmap in interface IRepaintController
